name: Tri-ship
description:
You're on an exploration mission, but you come across robot drones and you're trying to survive and gain as much points as possible.

You start in a small peaceful solar system, but don't be afraid to leave you will run in to another system soon and might encounter more enemies.

This is a procedural generated game in which you destroy enemies to revive points and the goal is to get as much points as possible.
